content: We have a need for an operation similar to an encounter$everything but instead of returning a searchset batch, we would like to return a collection batch. We could not find anything equivalent to that in an operation but wanted to double check before we proceed further. ThanQ for your insight
My understanding was that searchset just returns list of resources ids NOT the full resource. Is that wrong? Need is to return bundle containing all elements in a all resources
ThanQ. We misinterpreted the difference. I see it now. Operation uses searchset
